summary: A handsome plastic surgeon has a beauty clinic, where many a beautiful client falls in love with him. His unnoticed secretary is in love with him, too.
cast: Cary Grant|Helen Mack|Genevieve Tobin|Edward Everett Horton|Lucien Littlefield|Mona Maris|Katherine Williams|Lucille Lund|Rafael Alcayde|Doris Lloyd|Sam Ash|Helena Phillips Evans|Toby Wing|Henry Armetta|George Beranger|Judith Arlen|Joan Gale|Hazel Hayes|Lee Ann Meredith|Helen Cohan|Jean Carmen|Gigi Parrish|Ann Hovey|Betty Bryson|Julie Bishop|Ann Sheridan|Rita Gould|Bonita Weber|Dorothy Christy|Chick Collins|Dorothy Drake|Lu Ann Meredith|John Sinclair|August Tollaire|Mary Wallace|Milton Wallace
title: El templo de las hermosas
